corpname.value: Poly Archives & Special Collections at Bern Dibner Library of Science and Technology

unittitle.value: Guide to the Frederick Kreiling Papers, 1962-1968

abstract.label: Abstract
abstract.value: The Frederick Kreiling Papers primarily consist of Kreiling's correspondence from 1964-1968. Kreiling (1923-2004) was a professor in the Humanities and Social Science (HuSS) department at Polytechnic from 1948 to 1992.

p.value: Identification of item, date; RG-012: Frederick Kreiling Papers; box number; folder number; Poly Archives & Special Collections at Bern Dibner Library of Science and Technology.

This collection was donated in 2013 by Thomas B. Settle, former Professor of History in the Humanities and Social Sciences department and Professor Emeritus of the Technology, Culture, and Society department at Polytechnic.
The collection also includes biographical information about Kreiling, information about the History of Science program at Polytechnic, and annual reports from the NYC Department of Air Pollution.

corpname.value: Polytechnic University (Brooklyn, New York, N.Y.) -- Department of Social Sciences.
